name: Haisen Zhao
content: Haisen Zhao's Homepage [Home] [Publications] [Group] Chinese Version Haisen Zhao | 赵海森 Professor Shandong University Interdisciplinary Research Center School of Computer Science and Technology 72 Binhai Ave, Jimo, Qingdao, China, 266237 Office: 408 Email: haisenzhao [at] gmail.com, haisenzhao [at] sdu.edu.cn Recruiting research interns, master/Ph.D. candidates and postdoctors !!! Bio Haisen Zhao is a professor (CV) of Shandong University (SDU). He is a member of the Interdisciplinary Research Center. His research interest lies at the geometric processing and its application for digital fabrication, including additive manufacturing and subtractive manufacturing. He completed his Ph.D. from Shandong University (2018) under the supervision of Baoquan Chen and received Master's and Bachelor's degree in School of Computer Science and Technology and School of Software at Shandong University in 2014 and 2011, respectively. Haisen Zhao was a postdoctor at the University of Washington, as a member of the Computer Graphics Group (GRAIL), working with Prof. Adriana Schulz from 2019 to 2021. He was a postdoctor at the Institute of Science and Technology Austria (IST Austria), as a member of the Computer Graphics and Digital Fabrication Group, working with Prof. Bernd Bickel from 2021 to 2022. 赵海森，山东大学计算机学院教授，山东大学杰出中青年人才，国家级青年人才，博士生导师。主要研究方向为计算机图形学、数字几何设计，人工智能 驱动的几何设计与制造。2018年12月获得山东大学工学博士学位，导师为陈宝权教授。2019年至2022年分别在美国华盛顿大学和奥地利科学技术研究所从事博士后研究，导师为Adriana Schulz 教授和Bernd Bickel教授。曾在ACM Transactions on Graphics (TOG)、ACM SIGGRAPH/Asia、IEEE Transactions on Visualization and Graphics (TVCG)、IROS等顶级期刊或会议上发表论文十余篇，申请十余项国家发明专利和一项美国发明专利，出版专著1部。 主持海外优青项目、重点研发计划课题、基金委面上项目等国家级科研项目。作为项目骨干，参与科技部新一代人工智能 (2030) 项目，基金委区域联合重点基金项目等项目。 担任中国计算机学会CAD&CG专委会委员，中国工业与应用数学学会GDC专委会委员，中国图像图形学会青年工作委员会委员，中国图像图形学会三维视觉专委会委员，中国图像图形学会智能图形专委会委员，中国图学学会微观几何设计与制造专委会委员。 获山东省自然科学奖一等奖、“CCF优秀博士学位论文奖”和“CAD&CG 2012优秀学生论文”等荣誉。 News Nov. 12, 2025: Our Chapper paper is selected for the Technical Papers Trailer of SIGGRAPH Asia 2025. Nov. 06, 2025: 1 paper accepted by 3DV 2026. Sep. 3, 2025: invited to be a TPC member of SIGGRAPH 2026. Aug. 10, 2025: 2 papers conditionally accepted by SIGGRAPH Asia 2025. Aug. 06, 2025: Our Graphical Modles paper is online. May. 15, 2025: Zhenmin will present our CGF paper at Eurographics 2025. Apr. 29, 2025: Congrats Fanchao for Winning President's Scholarship of SDU. Mar. 29, 2025: 2 papers conditionally accepted by SIGGRAPH 2025. Feb. 28, 2025: invited to present at Asiagraphics Workshop on Intelligent Graphics. Jan. 07, 2025: invited to present our CGF paper at Eurographics 2025. Oct. 05, 2024: invited to be a TPC member of SIGGRAPH 2025.
